definitions.definition: state that one refuses to admit the truth or existence of.
examples: they deny any responsibility for the tragedy
synonyms: rebut; Moreinformalpoke holes in; formalgainsay "the report was denied by witnesses"

definitions.definition: refuse to admit the truth of (a concept or proposition that is supported by the majority of scientific or historical evidence).
examples: an anti-environmentalist campaign group that denies climate change

definitions.definition: refuse to give or grant (something requested or desired) to (someone).
examples: the inquiry was denied access to intelligence sources
synonyms: dismiss; Moreinformalgive the thumbs down to

examples: he had denied himself sexually for years
the servants are ordered to deny him
